23  abstract public function _getFiles();

25  public function frmAddCrudController() {
26  $config = Startup::getConfig ();
27  $resources = CacheManager::getModels ( $config, true );
28  $resources = \array_combine ( $resources, $resources );
29  $resourcesList = $this->jquery->semantic ()->htmlDropdown ( "resources-list", "", $resources );
30  $resourcesList->asSelect ( "crud-model" );
31  $viewList = $this->jquery->semantic ()->htmlDropdown ( "view-list", "", AdminScaffoldController::$views ["CRUD"] );
32  $viewList->asSelect ( "crud-views", true );
33  $viewList->setDefaultText ( "Select views" );
34  $viewList->setProperty ( "style", "display: none;" );
35  $frm = $this->jquery->semantic ()->htmlForm ( "crud-controller-frm" );
36  $frm->addExtraFieldRule ( "crud-model", "exactCount[1]" );
37  $frm->addExtraFieldRules ( "crud-name", [ "empty",[ "checkController","Controller {value} already exists!" ] ] );
38  $this->jquery->exec ( Rule::ajax ( $this->jquery, "checkController", $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/_controllerExists/crud-name", "{}", "result=data.result;", "postForm", [ "form" => "crud-controller-frm" ] ), true );
39 
40  $frm->setValidationParams ( [ "on" => "blur","inline" => true ] );
41  $frm->setSubmitParams ( $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/addCrudController", "#frm" );
42  $this->jquery->change ( "#ck-add-route", "$('#div-new-route').toggle($(this).is(':checked'));" );
43  $this->jquery->jsonOn ( "change", "#ck-add-route", $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/_addCtrlRoute/crud", "post", [ "context" => "$('#crud-controller-frm')","params" => "$('#crud-controller-frm').serialize()","jsCondition" => "$('#ck-add-route').is(':checked')" ] );
44 
45  $this->jquery->click ( "#validate-btn", '$("#crud-controller-frm").form("submit");' );
46  $this->jquery->execOn ( "click", "#cancel-btn", '$("#frm").html("");' );
47  $this->jquery->exec ( "$('#crud-datas-ck').checkbox();", true );
48 
49  $this->jquery->exec ( "$('#crud-viewer-ck').checkbox();", true );
50  $this->jquery->exec ( "$('#crud-events-ck').checkbox();", true );
51  $this->jquery->exec ( "$('#ck-add-route').checkbox();", true );
52 
53  $this->jquery->exec ( '$("#crud-files-ck").checkbox({onChange:function(){ $("#view-list").toggle($("#crud-files-ck").checkbox("is checked"));}});', true );
54  $this->jquery->renderView ( $this->_getFiles ()->getViewAddCrudController (), [ "controllerNS" => Startup::getNS ( "controllers" ) ] );
55  }
56 
57  public function _addCtrlRoute($type) {
58  if (URequest::isPost ()) {
59  $result = [ ];
60  UResponse::asJSON ();
61 
62  $controller = "\\" . $_POST [$type . "-name"];
63  $controller = ClassUtils::getClassSimpleName ( $controller );
64  $result ["route-path"] = $controller;
65  echo json_encode ( $result );
66  }
67  }
68 
69  public function addCrudController() {
70  if (URequest::isPost ()) {
71  $views = null;
72  if (isset ( $_POST ["crud-files"] )) {
73  $views = $_POST ["crud-views"] ?? null;
74  }
75  $route = '';
76  if (isset ( $_POST ["ck-add-route"] )) {
77  $route = $_POST ["route-path"] ?? '';
78  }
79  $this->scaffold->addCrudController ( ucfirst ( trim ( $_POST ["crud-name"] ) ), UString::doubleBackSlashes ( $_POST ["crud-model"] ), $_POST ["crud-datas"] ?? null, $_POST ["crud-viewer"] ?? null, $_POST ["crud-events"] ?? null, $views, $route );
80  $this->jquery->get ( $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/_refreshControllers/refresh", "#dtControllers", [ "jqueryDone" => "replaceWith","hasLoader" => false,"dataType" => "html" ] );
81  echo $this->jquery->compile ( $this->view );
82  }
83  }
84 
85  public function frmAddAuthController() {
86  $viewList = $this->jquery->semantic ()->htmlDropdown ( "view-list", "", AdminScaffoldController::$views ["auth"] );
87  $viewList->asSelect ( "auth-views", true );
88  $viewList->setDefaultText ( "Select views" );
89  $viewList->setProperty ( "style", "display: none;" );
90  $authControllers = CacheManager::getControllers ( "Ubiquity\\controllers\\auth\\AuthController", false, true );
91  $authControllers = array_combine ( $authControllers, $authControllers );
92  $ctrlList = $this->jquery->semantic ()->htmlDropdown ( "ctrl-list", "Ubiquity\\controllers\\auth\\AuthController", $authControllers );
93  $ctrlList->asSelect ( "baseClass" );
94  $ctrlList->setDefaultText ( "Select base class" );
95 
96  $frm = $this->jquery->semantic ()->htmlForm ( "auth-controller-frm" );
97  $frm->addExtraFieldRules ( "auth-name", [ "empty",[ "checkController","Controller {value} already exists!" ] ] );
98  $this->jquery->exec ( Rule::ajax ( $this->jquery, "checkController", $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/_controllerExists/auth-name", "{}", "result=data.result;", "postForm", [ "form" => "auth-controller-frm" ] ), true );
99 
100  $frm->setValidationParams ( [ "on" => "blur","inline" => true ] );
101  $frm->setSubmitParams ( $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/addAuthController", "#frm" );
102  $this->jquery->change ( "#ck-add-route", "$('#div-new-route').toggle($(this).is(':checked'));" );
103  $this->jquery->jsonOn ( "change", "#ck-add-route", $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/_addCtrlRoute/auth", "post", [ "context" => "$('#auth-controller-frm')","params" => "$('#auth-controller-frm').serialize()","jsCondition" => "$('#ck-add-route').is(':checked')" ] );
104 
105  $this->jquery->click ( "#validate-btn", '$("#auth-controller-frm").form("submit");' );
106  $this->jquery->execOn ( "click", "#cancel-btn", '$("#frm").html("");' );
107  $this->jquery->exec ( "$('#ck-add-route').checkbox();", true );
108  $this->jquery->exec ( '$("#auth-files-ck").checkbox({onChange:function(){ $("#view-list").toggle($("#auth-files-ck").checkbox("is checked"));}});', true );
109  $this->jquery->renderView ( $this->_getFiles ()->getViewAddAuthController (), [ "controllerNS" => Startup::getNS ( "controllers" ) ] );
110  }
111 
112  public function addAuthController() {
113  if (URequest::isPost ()) {
114  $views = null;
115  if (isset ( $_POST ["auth-files"] )) {
116  $views = $_POST ["auth-views"] ?? null;
117  }
118  $route = '';
119  if (isset ( $_POST ["ck-add-route"] )) {
120  $route = $_POST ["route-path"] ?? '';
121  }
122  $baseClass = $_POST ["baseClass"];
123  if (! UString::startswith ( $baseClass, "\\" )) {
124  $baseClass = "\\" . $baseClass;
125  }
126  $this->scaffold->addAuthController ( ucfirst ( $_POST ["auth-name"] ), $baseClass, $views, $route );
127  $this->jquery->get ( $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/_refreshControllers/refresh", "#dtControllers", [ "jqueryDone" => "replaceWith","hasLoader" => false,"dataType" => "html" ] );
128  echo $this->jquery->compile ( $this->view );
129  }
130  }
131 }
